title: Singing Shells v1.0.1 [Android] [.apk]
description:
Singing Shells is simple yet addictive brain-puzzle game. The rules are very simple, remember sounds and colors sequence and then repeat it.

You think that it is too simple ? How about only sounds sequence? Singing Shells offers two difficulty levels, Normal and Hard. 

Check how long sounds sequence you can remember.

Features:

- 7 types of shells
- Normal and Hard difficulty level.
- Hiscores
- Amazing graphics
- Training for your brain

---------------
At the beginning we start with one sound and color (one shell). If you correctly repeat a  given sequence, another shell is added to the sequence. Over time, easy at the beginning game turns into a real challenge for even the biggest fans of puzzles.
But if even that is not enough for you we have a second difficulty level, where you hear only sounds (no colors are shown). To deal with it you must know all the in-game sounds.
